com.communote.common.image

Class ImageScaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.image.ImageScaler

  • public class ImageScaler
extends Object
    Scales an image to a predefined size. By default the aspect ratio will be preserved. If isDrawBackground() is activated the resulting image will have the defined size. Any non image data will be filled with the color defined by setBackgroundColor(Color), isSameAspectRatio() must return true in that case. In case the image is smaller than the target size it won't be upscaled but the remaining data will be filled with the background color if isDrawBackground() returns true.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • resizeImage

        public byte[] resizeImage(byte[] data)
        Resizes a byte array of an image and returns the transformed byte array image. If sameAspectRatio is true the resulting image is scaled proportionally to the specified width or height. Images smaller than the defined dimensions will not be changed.
        Parameters:
        data - Binary image data
        Returns:
        returns the scaled byte array or null if the image data couldn't be parsed

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(Color backgroundColor)
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - the background color to use when isDrawBackground() is true

      • setDimension

        public void setDimension(ImageSize size)
        Parameters:
        size - the maximum size of the resulting image

      • setDrawBackground

        public void setDrawBackground(boolean drawBackground)
        Parameters:
        drawBackground - true to draw a background to reach the exact size as defined (only used if setSameAspectRatio(boolean) is true)

      • setFormatType

        public void setFormatType(ImageFormatType formatType)
        Parameters:
        formatType - the ImageFormatType to use

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(int height)
        Parameters:
        height - the maximum height of the image

      • setHorizontalAlignment

        public void setHorizontalAlignment(int alignment)
        Set the alignment to use for positioning the image horizontally within the scaled image. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the left edge, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the right edge. This setting only has an effect if a background should be drawn.
        Parameters:
        alignment - a value describing the horizontal alignment of the image

      • setSameAspectRatio

        public void setSameAspectRatio(boolean sameAspectRatio)
        Parameters:
        sameAspectRatio - Set to true to preserve the aspect ratio.

      • setVerticalAlignment

        public void setVerticalAlignment(int alignment)
        Set the alignment to use for positioning the image vertically within the scaled image. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the top edge, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the bottom edge. This setting only has an effect if a background should be drawn.
        Parameters:
        alignment - a value describing the vertical alignment of the image

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Parameters:
        width - the maximum width for the resulting image
